CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(
CASE(ProductCategory__c,
'Domestic Parcels', '/resource/CaseListIcons/DomesticParcels.png',
'Post Office & Business Hub Services', '/resource/CaseListIcons/PostOfficeProductsServices.png',
'International Parcels', '/resource/CaseListIcons/InternationalParcels.png',
'Travel & ID', '/resource/CaseListIcons/TravelIDServices.png',
'Money & Insurance', '/resource/CaseListIcons/MoneyInsurance.png',
'Domestic Letters', '/resource/CaseListIcons/DomesticLetters.png',
'International Letters', '/resource/CaseListIcons/InternationalLetters.png',
'Web & Apps', '/resource/CaseListIcons/InternationalLetters.png',
'/resource/CaseListIcons/Other.png'),''
)
CustomField.label: Product Image
